item.title: CFA Level 2: Fixed Income (part 1)
item.description: Credit Analysis Credit Risk Default Risk Credit Spread Risk Downgrade Risk Credit ratings by the nationally recognized rating agencies assess default risk only. Releases by Rating Agencies Credit Rating - reflects the probability of default (short- and long-term debt) and the rate of loss (long-term debt) Rating Watch - announcement that the rating agency is reviewing a particular issue in advance of a potential rating change Rating Outlook -
